faqs.title: How to reset my password
faqs.content: To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address and follow the instructions sent to your email.
solution_steps: Check your email for reset instructions
Follow the secure link in the email
Log in with your new credentials

faqs.title: How to view my billing history
faqs.content: You can view your billing history by logging into your account and navigating to the Billing section.
solution_steps: View your payment history and invoices
Set up payment notifications if desired

faqs.title: How to update my profile information
faqs.content: Update your profile information including name, email, phone number, and address in your account settings.

faqs.title: How to enable two-factor authentication
faqs.content: Enable two-factor authentication to add an extra layer of security to your account.
solution_steps: Go to Security Settings in your account
Choose your preferred method (SMS or authenticator app)

faqs.title: How to contact customer support
faqs.content: Contact our customer support team through multiple channels for assistance with your account or services.
solution_steps: Or use the live chat on our website
Or submit a support ticket through your account
Provide your account number for faster service
